title: Onna Paththi Nenachaaley Lyrics Kaadu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Onna paththi nenachaaley lyrics
Movie: Kaadu
Singer: haricharan
Music: K

Onna paththi nenachaaley
porai aerudhey
ullukulla  nodidhorum
veri aerudhey.
kannu rendum urangaama
kada podudhey.
kaalu rendum serukkoda
nada podudhey.

Oorum unnaala, azhagaagudhey
uryiaa oyaama, uyir aadudhey
kora pullkooda, maramaagudhey
kurudhi narambellaam
erumberudhey

Onna paththi nenachaaley
porai aerudhey
ullukulla  nodidhorum
veri aerudhey

Aagaayam pola unna
annaandhu paakkavechcha
padhaadhi kesamellaam
thannaala pookka vachcha.

Vaikkola pora neethaan
poonjolaiaaki vechcha
kodaangi paara enna
peengaana maaththi vechcha

Kadavul parisaaga
una naan arinjeney
thavare puriyaama
punidham adanjeney

Theruvil nadandhey nee
ponaa thaeru.
puzhudhi adhu kooda
aagum neeru.

Onna paththi nenachaaley
porai aerudhey
ullukulla  nodidhorum
veri aerudhey.
kannu rendum urangaama
kada podudhey.
kaalu rendum serukkoda
nada podudhey.

Aagaaaram thevayilla
un pera yaarum sonna
veraedhum venaam pulla
enkooda neeyum ninnaa

Ooththoda neeru pola
enkooda seru onnaa
unkooda seraavittaa
povenae naanum mannaa.

Piravi edhukkaaga
enakku theriyaadhu
adadaa una serndhaa
maranam kidayaadhu

Thonayaai iru neeyum
aaven aalaa
ena nee pirinjaa
poven paalaa.

Onna paththi nenachaaley
porai aerudhey
ullukulla  nodidhorum
veri aerudhey.
kannu rendum urangaama
kada podudhey.
kaalu rendum serukkoda
nada podudhey.

Oorum unnaala, azhagaagudhey
uryiaa oyaama, uyir aadudhey
kora pullkooda, maramaagudhey
kurudhi narambellaam
erumberudhey

ullukulla  nodidhorum
